META REVELATIONS - ARMOUR OF THE ABYSS

name: Meta Revelations: Armour of the Abyss
storyline:
"Are you brave enough to save yourself?"

A great scourge of devils are the Crestliches and she is one of them. Adena Krieger is an unlikely protagonist that fights fate! Enter an uncertain world which much like your own armour looks to imprison you. Forces of good and evil look to take advantage of your latent powers all while the menace of your kin lurks in the shadows to devour you whole. Learn about your curse, forge bonds and free yourself from the ties that bind you!
summary: A turn based RPG where you can adapt your armour and save the world! You are Adena Krieger - a cold blooded huntress. Uncover your mysterious past and prevent a calamity that is written in your name.
